entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.MemoryStream.ReadByte() can throw IndexOutOfRangeException in edge cases #88541
  • ComInterfaceGenerator warns twice on some warnings: once when generating the managed wrapper and another when making the native wrapper #88540
  • Android: new cil-strip feature causes app crashes #88538
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for DuplicatePropertyNameHandling to System.Text.Json #88536
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline completely broken #88534
    8.0.0
  • R2R: Add a CI or perf validation for # of methods jitted #88533
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Assertion failure in `DebuggerTests.HotReloadTests` on `main` - `src/mono/mono/component/debugger-engine.c:176` #88528
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support for hardware intrinsics to control treatment of subnormal numbers/denormals #88525
  • HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength Property doesn't support -1 contrary to the docs #88524
  • Add `JsonIncludeAttribute`/`JsonConstructorAttribute` support for private/inaccessible members in the source generator #88519
    9.0.0
  • [Design] .NET metrics naming standard #88515
  • Add DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.AllMethods/.AllFields/.AllEvents/etc #88512
  • Test failure profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #88507
  • `Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries` returns nonexistent paths on malformed input path #88504
  • [wasi] wasm trap: out of bounds memory access in sgen_gray_object_queue_trim_free_list #88501
    Future

Closed

  • Can runtime created type using Reflection.Emit be deleted or updated #88429
  • Fast-path serialization should provide OOTB support for JsonSerializerDefaults.Web #81985
    8.0.0
  • OptionsValidator source-gen causes VS analyzer to crash #88152
    8.0.0
  • The truncating conversion from BigInteger to Int128 ignores most significant bits #88389
  • SequenceReader<T>.Rewind(0) causes TryRead() to throw IndexOutOfRangeException #68774
    8.0.0
  • "System.Console.Clear()" does not clear the scroll buffer on Linux. #84351
    8.0.0
  • ILLink CodeFixer tests are failing #88278
    8.0.0
  • TypeInitializationException when calling HostBuilder.Build() #88518
  • Consider unsealing JsonSourceGenerationOptionsAttribute #56206
    Future
  • Optimize conversions between `Half` and `Single` #69667
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source generator improvements for .NET 8.0 #77019
    8.0.0
  • Consider extending JsonIncludeAttribute and JsonConstructorAttribute support to internal and private members. #87431
    8.0.0
  • Wasm SDK Multitargeting conventions for net8.0-browser #85333
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Consider implementing send buffering on .NET side #73691
    8.0.0
  • Disable JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #84378
    8.0.0
  • Run the ilc .sln project ILCompiler, and the object file it generates is garbled #88513
  • Array enumerators are not preinitialized anymore #82993
    Future
  • AOT build error during publish build in Blazor Wasm #88341
  • Attribute definitions included in assemblies using Nullable on the latest framework #85612
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes #82871 Add an additional constructor for StackTrace #88542
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Respect IsDynamicCodeSupported in more places in Linq.Expressions #88539
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Add GC.KeepAlive to COM paths in WeakReference #88537
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Light up core ASCII.Utility methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths. #88532
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Have jitstress_isas_x86_evex set PreferredVectorBitWidth=512 #88531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88530
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #88527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • fix processing of TLS renegotiation #88511
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2216774 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Use latest chrome for testing #88505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EnumBuilder implementation and other changes #88503
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution

Merged

  • Print variable types when dumping the output #88420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow Options source gen produce diagnostics from outside the compilation #88396
    area-Extensions-Options, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix Int128 truncating conversion discarding significant bits #88526
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • FIx SequenceReader Rewind(0) state corruption #86070
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix .cfi directives for ThePreStub #88259
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use E3 to completely clear console on Unix when possible #88487
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ignore suppressed diagnostics in code fix verifier #88492
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Improve BigInteger operators +, - and * for trivial cases #84733
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Reduce size of ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers when not inlined #88508
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • [wasm] Fix WasmBase.IsSupported in AOT #88523
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Extend `JsonIncludeAttribute` and `JsonConstructorAttribute` support to internal and private members #88452
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Tweaks to x86 call convention handling #88466
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable default JSON reflection when PublishTrimmed == true #88480
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Bring back old array enumerator code #88371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable failing `simpleruntimeeventvalidation` test on mono. #88500
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Disable runtime test dependent on creating a process #88498
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update testing.md #88364
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow (#86508) #87339
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation (#68835) #87143
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] Add MINT_STELEM_VT_NOREF #87161
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Avoid prefer-ing gsharedvt versions of AsyncMethodBuilder… #87990
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not say the wrong default behavior for blittable arrays in ComInterfaceGenerator warning #88212
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add some xml comments #88433
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Tar: Fix PAX regression when handling the size of really long unseekable data streams #88280
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update binding generator to do case-insensitive config-key/property name matching, & make some formatting improvements #88338
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • EventPipe support for ProcessInfo #87562
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V, LOONGARCH64] Fix FuncEvalHijack stack allocation #88493
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding Vector paths to ASCII GetIndexOfFirstNonAscii* Paths #88455
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • ConsoleLoggerProvider should reuse ConsoleUtils helper to align the behaviors #88477
    area-Extensions-Logging, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Enable Regex to use SearchValues<string> in compiled / source generator TryFindNextStartingPosition #88400
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser] mono_exit improvements #88387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Move Win32 resource emission to the compiler #88464
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix CoreCLR tests build with skipmanaged option #88321
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix missing GC events on non-Windows for nativeaot #88282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #88474
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #88475
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [browser] Migrate more Blazor features, prepare JavaScript API for Blazor cleanup #87959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - some refactoring, and rationalizing #88357
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Prevent Arm64 CrossDac builds running on Arm64. #88467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][MacOS] Run tests on iOS 17 and MacOS 14 scouting queues #88479
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose IUtf8SpanParsable and implement it on the primitive numeric types #86875
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add collection literal support for immutable collections #88470
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mini] Enter GC Unsafe mode in handle_signal_exception #88436
    area-VM-meta-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: publishing stopped #2336

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stub out hybrid globalization #2337
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: For the msbuild exec task, don't assume a working directory #2334

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Simpler and more precise init semantics for locals #2332
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Double-align the shadow frame when necessary #2315
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] `IlcOptimizationPreference` -> `OptimizationPreference` #2335

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a portable implementation of RhGetCodeTarget #2333

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • GenAPI emits nullable attributes rather than nullable syntax. #33853
  • .NET Native Library Packaging (RuntimeIdentifiers, build, testing, VS etc.) #33845

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle when the target graph is TF/RID to pull out the TF piece #33863
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Stabilize branding for the 7.0.400 release #33862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet tool update command: Download tool packages from nuget when update global tools #33861
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Create VS shortcut with SDK build environment automatically loaded #33839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.10
  • Containers: support mapping non-portable (source-built) rids to container manifest platforms. #33775
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Update the existing NETSDK 1045 error message to link to the download page #33446
    untriaged
  • Reenable in-test timeout #33700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Unblock sln add for a shared project #33837
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Containers: sync CreateNewImageToolTask with new CreateNewImage properties. #33765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: handle Basic auth, registries with non-Uri Realms, and registries that do not provide Service information #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add tests for disabling JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clarify where `[RequiresLocation]` is an error #7328

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize+ doesn't seem to fully discard all unreachable code #68929
  • Support inline arrays with collection literals #68927
  • Support inline arrays in EE #68926
  • Organize Imports command handler should apply changes using async progress UI #68921
  • class schema, class namespace wrongly composed and indented in Visual Studio 2022 #68920
  • IDE0027: false positive with pragmas #68913
  • CS4014 compiler warning does not work when using null-conditional call operator #68911
  • EnC: ChangingCapturedVariableScope rude edit does not have tests #68908

Closed

  • It looks like function pointer tests are hardcoded to perform testing at language version 9. #68835
    Compiler.Next
  • Synapse #68922
  • uk£LTD #68923
  • It looks like `ReturnsVoidIsSetBit` flag used in SourceMemberMethodSymbol.Flags is meaningless #68344
    Compiler.Next
  • csc takes far too long to compile 47MB of source code #49769
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68928
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch 'organize imports' to use the lightweight background wait indicator #68924
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix lossy error message when lexer encounters certain characters #68919
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove host specific args from CommandLineArgs #68918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update analyzers to 23356.2 #68916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve detection of ambiguous type-or-value receiver when it possibly refers to a captured primary constructor parameter #68914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • EnC analyzer refactoring: Abstract member bodies #68910
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Break individual string literals into multiple spell checking spans for all the individual words within them. #68909
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't hardcode C# 9 in function pointer tests #68902
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [Infra] Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing to 1.1.2-beta1.23323.1 #68888
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [Infra] Publish 17.8 P1 VS PRs #68925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add EA package for the compiler developer SDK #68628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where 'use primary constructor' could lose comments if a type had attributes on it #68915
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Followup to https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/68897 to return errantly stripped comments. #68917
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Moving lexing functions out of SlidingTextWindow #68906
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Check ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce memory consumption around SpellChecker object creation/usage. #68905
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow applying `RequiresLocation` and `Out` attributes to `ref readonly` parameters in source #68871
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Filter `RequiresLocationAttribute` from `ref readonly` parameters #68870
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Implement simple LSP run tests #68889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow client to configure language for resources #68739
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Add filePath when generates new Document in MoveTypeEditor #68900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Crossgen for .NET 8 #68721
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gracefully handle exceptions from DiagnosticSuppressor.SupportedSuppressions in IDE #68894
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • External Access EditorConfig generation #68896
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Allow function breakpoints before module symbols are loaded #67600
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Move to using primary constructors. #68907
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Warn on shadowing primary constructor parameter by a member from base #68864
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #49268
  • IActionResult and IAsyncDisposable #49266
  • ASP.NET Core Logging Azure Site Extension causes 500.30 ANCM Startup Error #49265
  • [Blazor] Have a way to configure dotnet runtime for blazor apps #49264
  • QuickGrid add OverscanCount parameter #49263
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #49256
  • Incorrect Resolution of Query Parameter in ASP.NET Core (.NET 7) #49255

Closed

  • Winform & Blazor can't show image in local #49202
  • Perf regression: https #49257
  • Avoid authentication redirect if previously authenticated and valid token exist #49242
  • On refresh of blazor webpage it loads forever. #49121
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48951
    8.0-preview7
  • Scroll doesn't work when calling NavigationManager.NavigateTo() same url with query and hash #48993
    8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Reenable ICU sharding tests #49191
    8.0-rc1
  • GET request with Content-Type multipart/form-data causes validation error #49252
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET metrics middleware #48666
  • Blazor Virtualize: Empty Rows Template #28770
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: fortunes #49240

PullRequests

Created

  • Update package baseline for 7.0 #49269
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2216668 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Forms streamline #49261
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Change message for stale PR #49270
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove redundant SourceBuildTrimNetFrameworkTargets property #49022
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Remove hosted from blazor wasm templates descriptions #48969
    area-mvc, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • Bug hash routing same page with params or query #48994
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `b239fb5` to `9a77922` #49260
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `251e720` to `be03d00` #49259
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • enable markdown linter #49254
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview7
  • Revert "[Blazor] Skip tests broken by bad dependency update (#49200)" #49258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • Add EmptyContent parameter to Virtualize component #49185
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • Improve debugging of produces and accepts metadata #49253
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/7.0] Backport pr 48892 to 7.0 #48911
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.10

Updated

  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Remove ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer #49193
    area-identity
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48817
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Update area-owners.md #49229
    area-infrastructure
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security, pending-ci-rerun
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [WIP] Support metadata only endpoints #46536
    area-routing
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change the way we detect Node.js in SignalR JS/TS client. #49066
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WithOrder to IEndpointConventionBuilder #49093
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Change AddServerSideBlazor to call services.AddRazorComponents().AddServerComponents() #49106
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #49246
    area-runtime, area-hosting
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Feedback on dumpasync #4047
    8.0.0
  • Diagnostics Repo Engineering Summary #3884
    8.0.0
  • Make dotnet-symbol available as standalone/self-contained download #4030
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Misc fix for issue that Juan hit #4053

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #3889

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Documentation] Frame IsClippedToBounds Property Default Value #16044
  • Crash when using a Flyout page with a footer on Android: Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first. #16043
  • Add support for DynamicResources in behaviors #16042
  • Implement context flyout menu accelerators on MacCatalyst #16041
  • MAUI sdk should default the JsonSerializerIsReflectionEnabledByDefault property to true #16038
  • Building AdHoc iOS in Release does not ask for permissions on device #16034

Closed

  • AbsoluteLayout.SetLayoutBounds() causes all AbsoluteLayout children to be measured and layed out. #6466
    .NET 8
  • InputTransparent with Opacity/IsVisible behaves differently with iOS/Mac vs Windows/Android #15608
    Backlog
  • under iOS, "parent.InputTransparent = false" does not propagate to children as it should #10203
    Backlog
  • [Bug] InputTransparent = false does not work. #14828
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ScrollView as a child item overlaps the brothers placed to the bottom #15966
    Backlog
  • Grid * Row is broken on iOS #15968
    Backlog
  • Disable MenuFlyoutItem #15896
  • FlyoutPage: Detail page is not fitting the screen on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15877
  • FlyoutPage: Scrolling is not working in the Detail page on iOS Tablets when setting the flyout behavior to Split. #15876
  • Maui ios app crash when using bindings for gradientstops #15919
  • Basic stuff must work in maui preview 6 #16036

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] fix memory leak in Window #16045
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Include headers/footers in EmptySource count so they show up when ItemsSource is null #15979
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Various fixes for Border on Android #15458
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    community ✨
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Make WinUI FilePicker FutureAccessList more robust #16026
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert, s/pr-needs-author-input

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ambiguous references when scaffolding tables with common names #31204

Closed

  • Include parent entity column name in child entity column name using data annotations #31068
  • DbContext get DbSet for interface (DbSet<interface>) #31185
  • Support for combining TPH and TPT inheritance strategies #31184
  • Disable lazy loading temporarily for a query #31158
  • ArgumentNullException when Where + OrderBy + GroupBy + ToListAsync #31114
  • Support primitive collections in the in-memory provider #31092
  • Flexible HasData seeding behaviors #31072
  • Should I be able to use the EF Core tools to apply migrations when using an interceptor to set my connection string #31055
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException exception when saving a master-detail graph where detail entity PK is Guid. (or Not)? #31042
  • Duplicate entries in join table when updating entity with many-to-many property/ies #31033
  • Sub-Entity will not be loaded correctly after applying a soft delete-mechanism within the same dbcontext with include #30884
  • EF set nvarchar(450) in case of having index for string property #31167

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add `migrations check-pending` Command #31164
    needs-design, waiting-for-response
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
    waiting-for-response
  • Fix to #30604 - Implement JSON serialization/deserialization via Utf8JsonReader/Utf8JsonWriter #31160

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian only, SDK dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1-x64.deb installing failed with error: archive 'dotnet-sdk-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #16646

PullRequests

Created

Merged

Updated
